column4: And hwo do I go about installing that NVIDIA-linux-x86-1.0-7667-pkg1.run
i mean, it's not on the CD
How long will it take to downlaod on 33k dialup?
why do you only have text mode?
warty probably doesnt support your card because its too old. maybe you do need to install that nvidia binary after all
im trying to remember where xfree86.conf is on warty
now you need to change the driver
type sudo nano /etc/X11/XF86Config-4 find the line where it says Driver          "nvidia". delete it and replace it with "vesa". then ctrl+x to exit. when it asks to save the buffer say yes
it says "nv" not "nvidia" sorry. only delete that word
